items.title: Under construction
items.text:
Year 7, 8 & GCSE modules are currently under construction. 
More details will be shared in the future.

This month has seen new updates including a refreshed homepage for easier navigation. The updated AI Usage page now makes writing AI prompts even easier! Finally, new resources have been added to the year 8 section, getting you ready for the end of year assessments.
items.title: February Updates
